definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become stupid (NH Aram. in derive.; Ar. kasla be sluggish, so N Syr. in deriv.; orig. mng. possibly thick, plump, fat; hence in good sense: [[כְּסָלִים]] loins, [[כֶּסֶל]], [[כִּסְלָה]] confidence; in bad sense: [[כֶּסֶל]], [[כִּסְלָה]], [[כְּסִילוּת]] stupidity, folly, [[כְּסִיל]] stupid fellow)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִכְסָָלוּ]] they become stupid Je 10:8 (‖[[יִבְעֲרוּ]] they become brutish).
